Desc.entry: Seeks to restore the cemetery situated behind Trebor Bassets on Livesey Street and Club Mill Road. Aims to: restore the cemetery to its former Victorian state; preserve and encourage wildlife; encourage visitors and help those looking for family descendents to find details of family and their family burial places; encourage the involvement of the community regardless of age or any other factors. Also aims to improve awareness of the cemetery in particular and the Wardsend area in general and to work closely with other groups.
